title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: 1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary
text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Temporary 
Increase of Official Controls and Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of 
Non-Animal Origin) (Amendment) Regulations 2020.
text_norm: 1 regulation may cited european union (temporary increase official control measure import food feed non-animal origin) (amendment) regulation 2020

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and
text_raw:
2. 

 The European Union (Temporary Increase of Official Controls and 
Measures on Imports of Food and Feed of Non-Animal Origin) Regulations 
2020 (S.I. No. 9 of 2020) are amended - 

(a) 

in Regulation 2- 

(i) 

by substituting for paragraph (1) the following – 

“2. (1) Subject to paragraph (2), these Regulations apply 
to- 

(a) 

(b) 

food of non-animal origin listed in Annexes 
(I), (II) or (IIa) to Regulation 2019/1793 that 
has, 
food, possible 
noncompliance with the maximum allowed 
levels of pesticide residues, or 

or on 

such 

in 

feed listed in Annexes (I) or (II) or (IIa) to 
Regulation 2019/1793 that is imported into the 
State from a country other than a Member 
State.”, 

(ii) by substituting for paragraph (2) the following - 

“(2) These Regulations do not apply to consignments 
of food of non-animal origin or feed of a net weight not 
exceeding 30 kg listed in Annex I and Annex II to 
Regulation 2019/1793 — 

(a) which are destined to a private person for 

personal consumption or use only, or 

(b) 

sent as trade samples, laboratory samples or as 
display items for exhibitions, that are not 

1 O.J. No. L144 of 07.05.2020, p.13 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 3rd July, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [237] 3 

intended to be placed on the market or are sent 
to be used for scientific purposes.”, 

(b) 

In Regulation 3 (1) by substituting for the definition of 
“Regulation 2019/1793” the following- 

 “‘Regulation 2019/1793’ means Commission Implementing 
Regulation (EU) 2019/1793 of 22 October 2019 as amended by 
Commission Implementing Regulation (EU) 2020/625 of 6 May 
2020;”, and 

(c) 

In Regulation 21 (1) by substituting for subparagraphs (f) and 
(g) the following- 

“(f) 

(g) 

fails to comply with a requirement on official certificates 
in contravention of Article 11, 

fails to comply with a prohibition on the entry into the 
Union of the food and feed listed in Annex IIa in 
contravention of Article 11a, or 

(h) otherwise contravenes a provision (mentioned in this 

Regulation)”. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

19 June, 2020. 

MICHAEL CREED, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [237]

title: the powers conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act
heading: (This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation) 

These Regulations update existing Regulations with regard to additional levels 
of controls on the import of certain food of non animal origin from specific 
third countries with regard to pesticide residues and on the import of certain 
feed of non animal origin from specific third countries 

 
 
 
 
 
 [237] 5
